00021 QList<Aki::SqlAddress*>
00022 SqlAddress::addressListForServer(const Aki::SqlServer* server)
00023 {
00024     QList<Aki::SqlAddress*> list;
00025     QSqlQuery query;
00026     query.prepare(QLatin1String("SELECT * FROM Address WHERE addressServer=?"));
00027     query.addBindValue(server->id());
00028 
00029     if (!query.exec()) {
00030         Aki::SqlAddressPrivate::checkError(query.lastError());
00031         return list;
00032     }
00033 
00034     if (query.size() == 0) {
00035         return list;
00036     }
00037 
00038     QSqlRecord record = query.record();
00039     const int id = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("id"));
00040     const int address = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("address"));
00041     const int port = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("port"));
00042     const int password = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("password"));
00043     const int ssl = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("ssl"));
00044     const int addressServer = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("addressServer"));
00045 
00046     while (query.next()) {
00047         Aki::SqlAddress* tmp = new Aki::SqlAddress;
00048         tmp->setAddress(query.value(address).toString());
00049         tmp->setAddressServerId(query.value(addressServer).toInt());
00050         tmp->setId(query.value(id).toInt());
00051         tmp->setPassword(query.value(password).toString());
00052         tmp->setPort(query.value(port).toInt());
00053         tmp->setSsl(query.value(ssl).toBool());
00054         list.append(tmp);
00055     }
00056 
00057     return list;
00058 }

00060 Aki::SqlAddress*
00061 SqlAddress::findAddress(const QString& address, const Aki::SqlServer* server)
00062 {
00063     QScopedPointer<Aki::SqlAddress> tmp(new Aki::SqlAddress);
00064     if (address.isEmpty() || address.isNull()) {
00065         return 0;
00066     }
00067     
00068     QSqlQuery query;
00069     query.prepare(QLatin1String("SELECT * FROM Address WHERE addressServer=? AND address=? LIMIT 1"));
00070     query.addBindValue(server->id());
00071     query.addBindValue(address);
00072 
00073     if (!query.exec()) {
00074         Aki::SqlAddressPrivate::checkError(query.lastError());
00075         return 0;
00076     }
00077 
00078     if (query.size() == 0) {
00079         return 0;
00080     }
00081 
00082     QSqlRecord record = query.record();
00083     const int id = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("id"));
00084     const int addressIndex = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("address"));
00085     const int port = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("port"));
00086     const int password = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("password"));
00087     const int ssl = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("ssl"));
00088     const int addressServer = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("addressServer"));
00089 
00090     while (query.next()) {
00091         tmp->setAddress(query.value(addressIndex).toString());
00092         tmp->setAddressServerId(query.value(addressServer).toInt());
00093         tmp->setId(query.value(id).toInt());
00094         tmp->setPassword(query.value(password).toString());
00095         tmp->setPort(query.value(port).toInt());
00096         tmp->setSsl(query.value(ssl).toBool());
00097         return tmp.take();
00098     }
00099 
00100     return 0;
00101 }

00103 Aki::SqlAddress*
00104 SqlAddress::newAddress(const QString& address, const Aki::SqlServer* server)
00105 {
00106     QSqlQuery query;
00107     query.prepare(QLatin1String("INSERT INTO Address (address,port,password,ssl,addressServer)"
00108                                 " VALUES(?,?,?,?,?)"));
00109     QScopedPointer<Aki::SqlAddress> tmp(new Aki::SqlAddress);
00110     tmp->setAddress(address);
00111     tmp->setAddressServerId(server->id());
00112     tmp->setPassword(QString());
00113     tmp->setPort(6667);
00114     tmp->setSsl(false);
00115 
00116     query.addBindValue(tmp->address());
00117     query.addBindValue(tmp->port());
00118     query.addBindValue(tmp->password());
00119     query.addBindValue(tmp->isSslEnabled());
00120     query.addBindValue(tmp->addressServerId());
00121 
00122     if (!query.exec()) {
00123         //Aki::SqlChannelPrivate::checkError(query.lastError());
00124         return 0;
00125     }
00126 
00127     tmp->setId(query.lastInsertId().toInt());
00128 
00129     return tmp.take();
00130 }

00133 SqlAddress::operator!=(const Aki::SqlAddress& rhs) const

00138 bool
00139 SqlAddress::operator==(const Aki::SqlAddress& rhs) const
00140 {
00141     return (address() == rhs.address() &&
00142             addressServerId() == rhs.addressServerId() &&
00143             id() == rhs.id() &&
00144             isSslEnabled() == rhs.isSslEnabled() &&
00145             password() == rhs.password() &&
00146             port() == rhs.port());
00147 }

00221 bool
00222 SqlAddress::save()
00223 {
00224     QSqlQuery query;
00225     query.prepare(QLatin1String("UPDATE Address SET address=?, port=?, password=?, ssl=?, addressServer=?"
00226                                 " WHERE id=?"));
00227     query.addBindValue(address());
00228     query.addBindValue(port());
00229     query.addBindValue(password());
00230     query.addBindValue(isSslEnabled());
00231     query.addBindValue(addressServerId());
00232     query.addBindValue(id());
00233 
00234     if (!query.exec()) {
00235         Aki::SqlAddressPrivate::checkError(query.lastError());
00236         return false;
00237     }
00238 
00239     return true;
00240 }

00242 bool
00243 SqlAddress::remove()
00244 {
00245     QSqlQuery query;
00246     const QString str = QLatin1String("DELETE FROM Address WHERE address=? AND addressServer=?");
00247     query.prepare(str);
00248     query.addBindValue(address());
00249     query.addBindValue(addressServerId());
00250 
00251     if (!query.exec()) {
00252         Aki::SqlAddressPrivate::checkError(query.lastError());
00253         return false;
00254     }
00255 
00256     return true;
00257 }
